versos: (parted) Exodus 14:21 - "Then Moses stretched out his hand over the sea, and all that night the Lord drove the sea back with a strong east wind and turned it into dry land. The waters were parted.";;;
(heads) 1 Corinthians 11:3 - But I want you to realize that the head of every man is Christ
(gihon) 2 Chronicles 32:30 - This same Hezekiah also stopped the upper watercourse of gihon
(goeth) Matthew 7:13 - "Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:";;;
(toward) Psalm 119:113 - "I hate those who are double-minded, but I love your law.";;;
(jesus) John 1:17 - "For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through jesus Christ.";;;
(mayest) 1 Timothy 4:15 - Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.;
(shalt) Exodus 20:3 - "Thou shalt have no other gods before me.";;;
(die) John 8:21 - "Once more Jesus said to them, 'I am going away, and you will look for me, and you will die in your sin. Where I go, you cannot come.'";;;
(help) Psalm 46:1 - "God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.";;;

(adam) Genesis 2:19 - Now the Lord God had formed out of the ground all the wild animals and all the birds in the sky. He brought them to the man to see what he would name them; and whatever the man called each living creature, that was its name.;;;
(woman) Genesis 2:22 - "Then the LORD God made a woman from the rib he had taken out of the man, and he brought her to the man.";;;
(cleave) Genesis 2:24 - "Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.";;;
(serpent) Genesis 3:1 - "Now the serpent was more crafty than any of the wild animals the Lord God had made.";;;
(opened) Luke 24:32 - "They asked each other, 'Were not our hearts burning within us while he talked with us on the road and opened the Scriptures to us'";;;
(gods) Psalm 82:6 - "I said, 'You are gods; you are all sons of the Most High.'";;;
